scripts.clean:additional: npx rimraf wedding-common-1.0.0.tgz && npx rimraf --glob common/tsconfig.tsbuildinfo 'lambdas/*/tsconfig.tsbuildinfo' && npx rimraf --glob *.zip
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean && npm run clean:modules && npm run clean:additional
scripts.common:bump:patch: npm version -w common patch --no-git-tag-version && npm run sync:common:version && npm install
scripts.common:bump:minor: npm version -w common minor --no-git-tag-version && npm run sync:common:version && npm install
scripts.common:bump:major: npm version -w common major --no-git-tag-version && npm run sync:common:version && npm install
scripts.pack:common: npm -w common run build && node -e "const {execSync}=require('node:child_process'); const out=execSync('npm pack --json ./common',{stdio:['ignore','pipe','inherit']}).toString(); const f=JSON.parse(out)[0].filename; console.log(f);"
